mapper.select: SELECT NVL( (SELECT 1 FROM TB_USER WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND EMAIL= #{email} AND ROWNUM = 1 ), 0) AS EXIST FROM dual
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO VICT.TB_USER ( USER_SEQ ,EMAIL ,NICKNAME ,PASSWORD ,USER_NAME ,BIRTHDAY ,GENDER ,PHON_NUM ,BLOG_URL ,REG_DATE ,END_DATE ,LAST_LOGIN_TIME ,USE_YN ,SALT ) VALUES( 1 ,'test@naver.com' ,'관리자' ,'1234' ,'윤진영' ,'19940822 ,2 ,'010-3184-0025' ,'https://blog.naver.com/third_run' ,TIMESTAMP '2025-01-18 16:59:22.000000' ,NULL ,NULL , Y' ,'123124' );
